article: It was the first day of biology class. The teacher wanted to give a good  _  to his class. He wanted to  open up  his students' eyes to the world of biology. He decided to show the kids something  _  and teach them a lesson at the same time. He asked his students to  _  carefully. Then he began. He put a worm into a glass of water. The worm  _  around in the water. Then he put a second worm into a glass full of alcohol . It died at once. He asked the students if anyone knew about  _  they learned from it.
